entry.title: flofehrenbacher/hex-2-rgb: Super lightweight typescript function to convert hexes of format #RRGGBB to rgb of value rgb(x,y,z) or rgba(x,y,z,a).
entry.content: Super lightweight typescript function to convert hexes of format #RRGGBB to rgb of value rgb(x,y,z) or rgba(x,y,z,a).

entry.title: yerTools/simple-frontend-stack: A lightweight frontend stack for rapid web app development powered by SolidJS, TailwindCSS, and DaisyUI. Includes optional PocketBase backend with Bun and Vite for blazing-fast development workflow. Features responsive design, component libraries, animations, and production-ready optimizations with comprehensive CI/CD pipeline.
entry.content: A lightweight frontend stack for rapid web app development powered by SolidJS, TailwindCSS, and DaisyUI. Includes optional PocketBase backend with Bun and Vite for blazing-fast development workflow. Features responsive design, component libraries, animations, and production-ready optimizations with comprehensive CI/CD pipeline.

entry.title: eversonl/claude-config-manager: A lightweight, command-line tool for managing Claude Desktop MCP (Model Context Protocol) configurations. This tool makes it easy to toggle MCP servers on and off, create preset configurations, and manage backups.
entry.content: A lightweight, command-line tool for managing Claude Desktop MCP (Model Context Protocol) configurations. This tool makes it easy to toggle MCP servers on and off, create preset configurations, and manage backups.

entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: HassanSattar3/SnipShare: A lightweight, secure text sharing solution that works entirely in the browser with no backend required. Perfect for quickly sharing snippets of text, code, or messages that automatically expire.
